definition: Mt Tiantai near Shaoxing 紹興|绍兴[Shao4 xing1] in Zhejiang, the center of Tiantai Buddhism 天台宗[Tian1 tai2 zong1]
day/sky/heaven

typhoon
Taiwan (abbr.)/surname Tai

sentences.english: The peaks of Tiantai Mountain in Zhejiang are green and black. They stand like an ornamental screen.
sentences.chinese: 浙江天台山的山峰是青黛色的，犹如竖起的画屏。

sentences.english: As recorded in the book, the first place Xu traveled to was Taintai Mountain in Tiantai County, Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 据史料记载，徐霞客首游地点为浙江省天台山。

sentences.english: Tiantai Mountains are located in the middle-EAST of Zhejiang Province, China, ranking amongst National Key Scenic and Historic Interest Spots.
sentences.chinese: 天台山位于浙江省中东部，是国家重点风景名胜区。
